Text: The only one who eats aids infected ass hp;es is you, my closet case, self hating, homophobic friend.  Is your vocabulary of invectives so limited that you must troll with such vile homophobic comments?  May I suggest that you (1) leave your parents basement and get your own place, (2) buy a bottle of Clearasil, Listerine and Deodorant to tend to the personal hygene you've no doubt been neglecting, and (3) get a boyfriend.  If you still feel the need to hurl insults, why not read some Shakesprear and spiff up your put downs a little? No one likes to see a self hating homosexual, which you obviously are.
looks like our banterous comrades have esquired some psundonames to further the extension of their ill love for one another..... What will happen next??
